Tape: Tape can be used to create a makeshift stencil for painting or crafting. It can also be used as a repair tool for small cracks or holes.
Binder clips: Binder clips can be used to organize cables or hold papers together. They can also be used as a makeshift zipper or button for clothing.
Clothespins: Clothespins can be used to hold papers or documents together. They can also be used as a makeshift clamp or hold-down device in DIY projects.
Paper clips: Paper clips can be used to hold papers or documents together. They can also be used as a makeshift zipper or button for clothing.
Plastic straws: Plastic straws can be used as a makeshift pipe for small projects. They can also be used as a makeshift extension for tools.
